newsitem.title: HONDURAS: Grenade attacks injure eight in Honduras.
newsitem.headline: Grenade attacks injure eight in Honduras.

text.p: Eight people were wounded in three separate grenade attacks in Honduras' second-largest city on Friday, officials said.
Unidentified assailants threw the grenades at government legal and immigration offices and at a private office in San Pedro Sula, police lieutenant Hector Mejia told Reuters in a telephone interview.
No groups or persons claimed responsibility for the attacks in what is considered the most violent city in Honduras.
